title: Beto's 2020 Bid, Andrew Yang's Basic Income Push & Odd Solutions to Policing Problems | Jacob Tobia
itunes:title: Beto's 2020 Bid, Andrew Yang's Basic Income Push & Odd Solutions to Policing Problems | Jacob Tobia
description:
Ronny Chieng talks universal basic income with 2020 presidential contender Andrew Yang, Dulce Sloan weighs in on bizarre police initiatives, and Jacob Tobia discusses "Sissy."
